languages.text: Тяжелые раны были получены Лорд-капитаном и е{mf|го|е} свитой в ходе планетарного штурма в битве с хелбрутом Криком скверны. Но сражение в разгаре, и у воинов нет времени на исцеление и отдых.

The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue suffered heavy injuries over the course of the planetary assault and in the fight with the Helbrute Doomscream. Yet the battle rages on, and these warriors have no time for healing or rest.
languages.original_text: Тяжелые раны были получены Лорд-капитаном и е{mf|го|е} свитой в ходе планетарного штурма в битве с хелбрутом Криком скверны. Но сражение в разгаре, и у воинов нет времени на исцеление и отдых.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue suffered heavy injuries over the course of the planetary assault and in the fight with the Helbrute Balescream. But the battle rages on, and the warriors have no time for healing or rest.

The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue suffered heavy injuries over the course of the planetary assault and in the fight with the Helbrute Balescream. But the battle rages on, and the warriors have no time for healing or rest.

The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue suffered heavy injuries over the course of the planetary assault and in the fight with the Helbrute Balescream. Yet the battle rages on, and these warriors have no time for healing or rest.

The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue suffered heavy injuries over the course of the planetary assault and in the fight with the Helbrute Doomscream. Yet the battle rages on, and these warriors have no time for healing or rest.

The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue suffered heavy injuries over the course of the planetary assault and in the fight with the Helbrute Doomscream. Yet the battle rages on, and these warriors have no time for healing or rest.

languages.text: 领主舰长与{mf|他|她}的随行人员在攻打行星期间，以及与地狱兽“灾啸”的那场战斗中受到了重创。然而，战斗依然没有结束，战士们没有任何时间休养生息。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue suffered heavy injuries over the course of the planetary assault and in the fight with the Helbrute Doomscream. Yet the battle rages on, and these warriors have no time for healing or rest.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长与{mf|他|她}的随行人员在攻打行星期间，以及与地狱兽“灾啸”的那场战斗中受到了重创。然而，战斗依然没有结束，战士们没有任何时间休养生息。

languages.text: L'assaut planétaire et le combat contre le Métabrutus Fléau Hurlant ont laissé {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et son entourage dans un piteux état. Mais le conflit continue de faire rage et pour ces guerriers, l'heure n'est ni au repos ni aux soins.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue suffered heavy injuries over the course of the planetary assault and in the fight with the Helbrute Doomscream. Yet the battle rages on, and these warriors have no time for healing or rest.

traits.locale_text: L'assaut planétaire et le combat contre le Métabrutus Fléau Hurlant ont laissé {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et son entourage dans un piteux état. Mais le conflit continue de faire rage et pour ces guerriers, l'heure n'est ni au repos ni aux soins.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンとその従者は惑星襲撃の過程とドゥームスクリームと呼ばれるヘルブルートとの戦いで重症を負った。しかし、戦いは激しさを増し、戦士たちに癒しや休息の時間は与えられない。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue suffered heavy injuries over the course of the planetary assault and in the fight with the Helbrute Doomscream. Yet the battle rages on, and these warriors have no time for healing or rest.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンとその従者は惑星襲撃の過程とドゥームスクリームと呼ばれるヘルブルートとの戦いで重症を負った。しかし、戦いは激しさを増し、戦士たちに癒しや休息の時間は与えられない。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán y su séquito sufrieron graves heridas durante el asalto planetario y la batalla contra el Bruto Infernal, Doomscream. Sin embargo, la batalla aún ruge y no hay tiempo para descansar ni curarse.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue suffered heavy injuries over the course of the planetary assault and in the fight with the Helbrute Doomscream. Yet the battle rages on, and these warriors have no time for healing or rest.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán y su séquito sufrieron graves heridas durante el asalto planetario y la batalla contra el Bruto Infernal, Balescream. Sin embargo, la batalla aún ruge y no hay tiempo para descansar ni curarse.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain und sein Gefolge haben bei dem Angriff auf den Planeten und bei dem Kampf mit dem Höllenschlächter Unheilsschrei schwere Verletzungen davongetragen. Doch der Kampf tobt weiter, und diese Krieger haben keine Zeit, ihre Wunden heilen zu lassen oder sich auszuruhen.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue suffered heavy injuries over the course of the planetary assault and in the fight with the Helbrute Doomscream. Yet the battle rages on, and these warriors have no time for healing or rest.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain und sein Gefolge haben bei dem Angriff auf den Planeten und bei dem Kampf mit dem Höllenschlächter Unheilsschrei schwere Verletzungen davongetragen. Doch der Kampf tobt weiter, und diese Krieger haben keine Zeit, ihre Wunden heilen zu lassen oder sich auszuruhen.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan ve maiyeti, gezegen taarruzu ve Tamu Kaçkını Belanarası'yla savaşları esnasında ağır kayıplar verdi. Ancak savaş devam ediyor, savaşçıların durup dinlenecek ya da yaralarını saracak zamanı yok.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue suffered heavy injuries over the course of the planetary assault and in the fight with the Helbrute Doomscream. Yet the battle rages on, and these warriors have no time for healing or rest.
